item.title: If You Want to Be Robust, Be Wary of Initialization
item.description: Proper weight initialization significantly boosts Graph Neural Network (GNN) and Deep Neural Network (DNN) robustness against adversarial attacks, highlighting a critical, often-overlooked factor.
